page.title: 20LOCAL NEWS:C.V.CHRONICLE.
page.content: We selected news relevant to our block from three issues of the 'Colne Valley Chronicle',the local weekly paper. On 28.6.85. there were stories on the lack of basic amenities in 10% of the area's houses and on Slaithwaite Band Club's first car boot sale. On 5.7.85. there were reports on solvent and drug abuse locally,a plan to tip sewage sludge in Scammonden, the filming of episodes of 'In Loving Memory' in the area and Slaithwaite Cricket Club's seven point lead in 'B' Section of the Huddersfield League. On 12.7.85. there were items on the Slaithwaite Parish Church Feast Day and on the retirement at the next election of the Liberal M.P. for the Colne Valley, Mr.Richard Wainwright. ==================== This survey has been done by Junior pupils and staff at Wilberlee School.
